title: Window Counter App Landing Page
projectText: Window Counter is an app I built with SwiftUI & React Native. It makes estimating easier for window cleaners. Since my first version I have had over 2000 downloads.

title: Thailand Explorer Single Page App
projectText: Thailand Explorer was my first single page app. The data from WikiVoyage, Google Maps & YouTube, API’s are based on a custom location API that generates a random location and data.

title: Groovy Hats Shopify Store
projectText: Groovy Hats is a Headless Shopify Store. It’s built with React and Gatsby. It utilizes the Shopify GraphQL API. This is my first store of many. Shopify is such a pleasure to work with.

title: Window Cleaning Landing Page
projectText: Long Beach Window Washing landing page built in Webflow. Solves a problem for homeowners, by helping them quickly get a price and schedule a window cleaning service.

title: Namjai React Firebase Web App
projectText: Namjai is a side project. Styled by hand using Styled Components. I used Firebase for authentication and storage. A friend challenged me to create the design in React.

title: Oceanfront Hacienda Webflow Site
projectText: Oceanfront Hacienda is a direct booking website for a vacation rental. It’s built in Webflow with a third party booking engine. The design was created by empathizing with guest experiences.
